FuncDef: The help command displays the format of all the commands in the SFTP client view.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the format of the specified command in the SFTP client view.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters.

Examples: get Remote file name STRING<1-128> [Local file name STRING<1-128>]     Download file.
Default local file name is the same with remote file.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can use this command to get the help information and format of the specified command in the SFTP client view.
You can use help or ? to get the help information of SFTP commands.
